name: Tom Pitterson
title: Ceo Of ABC Institute
desc: This course was short but very informative and very helpful for an aspiring leader like myself. It also helped me understand how to view or understand when I receive feedback. I highly recommend it!!

name: Lili Watson
title: Ceo Of XYZ Institute
desc: I enjoyed the course and learned a lot from it. The content is well organised and focused on practical situations. I particularly enjoyed the bits of psychological research shared in the content.

name: Alen Torch
title: Manager Of DFG Institute
desc: This course is great for me for two reasons: Its has a powerful 'why' for effective feedback process and a very convincing and practical 'how' of giving feedback - It has left me with practical execises to practise the skill and sharpen my acumen
